mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T2.XM, T2.ZW, T2.RQ, T7.HTBH JHBH, T6.LJMC, T5.GYDLMC, T4.GYXLMC, T3.SBMC, T.YWCL FROM T_SCGL_BGRWFP_BG_RW T, T_SCGL_BGRWFP_BG_SB T1, T_SCGL_BGRWFP T2, T_SBGL_SBGL T3, T_SCGL_LJGYBZ T4, T_SCGL_GYDLBZ T5, T_SCJHGL_LJGL T6, T_SCJHGL_HTGL T7 WHERE 1=1 AND T.FPSBID = T1.ID AND T1.BGRWFPID = T2.ID AND T.YWCL IS NOT NULL AND T1.SBID = T3.ID AND T.LJGYBZID = T4.ID AND T4.GYDLBZID = T5.ID AND T5.LJID = T6.ID AND T6.HTID = T7.ID AND T1.BGRWFPID = #{ID} ORDER BY XM,LJMC,GYDLMC,GYXLMC,SBMC

SELECT T.ID, T2.XM, T2.ZW, T2.RQ, T7.HTBH JHBH, T6.LJMC, T5.GYDLMC, T4.GYXLMC, T3.SBMC, T.YWCL, T6.SFSBJ, T.LJGYBZID FROM T_SCGL_BGRWFP_BG_RW T, T_SCGL_BGRWFP_BG_SB T1, T_SCGL_BGRWFP T2, T_SBGL_SBGL T3, T_SCGL_LJGYBZ T4, T_SCGL_GYDLBZ T5, T_SCJHGL_LJGL T6, T_SCJHGL_HTGL T7 WHERE 1=1 AND T.FPSBID = T1.ID AND T1.BGRWFPID = T2.ID AND T.YWCL IS NOT NULL AND T1.SBID = T3.ID AND T.LJGYBZID = T4.ID AND T4.GYDLBZID = T5.ID AND T5.LJID = T6.ID AND T6.HTID = T7.ID AND T1.BGRWFPID = #{ID} ORDER BY SFSBJ,XM,LJMC,GYDLMC,GYXLMC,SBMC
